text: It did not take Kamsa long to figure out
that, Krishna was his dreaded nephew since his birth,
coincided with that of Devaki's child.
Hrrrmmm    hrmmmmmm
Putana
Hahahahahah           hahahahahaha
Putana, go out and kill every child born in  the month of Sravan.
Yes your majesty.
Putana disappeared from the court of Kamsa
and went to each and every village killing every newborn baby.
Meanwhile in Gokul, every house was decorated
as people were happy for their chief Nanda Gopal's child.
Putana heard  the news about the birth of Krishna and planned to kill him, too.

She disguised herself as a young      
 gopika
and visited the house of  Yashoda to see her baby son.
Yashoda Yashoda.
What do you want ?
Nothing. I just came to see your son, Krishna.
Ah
Here he is playing in the cradle.
Yashoda seeing her beauty let her play with Krishna .
As Putana played with Krishna, Yashoda engaged herself in household duties.
After some time, Putana looked  around.
It so happened that nobody was nearby.
She lifted the child from the cradle and taking him in her arms.
She slipped out of the house and moved to the outskirts of Gokul.
She was already prepared to kill the baby with her breasts smeared in poison.
But little Krishna started sucking her very life
It caused so much pain to the huge demoness that she shrieked out,
enough, enough leave me leave me.
She tried hard to free herself from Krishna,
but she couldn't.
With a terrific cry Putana fell down dead.
The loud cry shook the whole village.
Yashoda came out and noticed that Krishna was missing in his cradle
and ran out to the place.
Krishna Krishna who is this demoness?
Guess she's the same demoness who killed small babies.
It's a good thing someone killed her.
Oh. Krishna
I will never leave you alone even for a moment.
Yashoda took the child in her arms
and Krishna was laughing and playing in her arms
as though nothing had happened.
